Home » 15A4 Catukkanipātapāḷi » 5 Pañcamapaṇṇāsaka » 5.7 Kammapathavagga
5.7.8 Abhijjhālusutta
Pañcamapaṇṇāsaka
Kammapathavagga
Abhijjhālusutta
271.
1589…pe…  Attanā ca abhijjhālu hoti, parañca abhijjhāya samādapeti, abhijjhāya ca samanuñño hoti, abhijjhāya ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati…pe… .
1590Attanā ca anabhijjhālu hoti, parañca anabhijjhāya samādapeti, anabhijjhāya ca samanuñño hoti, anabhijjhāya ca vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati—  imehi kho…pe… .
1591Aṭṭhamaṃ.
